LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.ActionByLi: Sort operations based on the target body part
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.ActionByRe: Sort by required research. If there are several, uses the first.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.ActionNoop: Do nothing. This can be used to skip the remaining rules in the module.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CondOrDesc: Matches if any of the contained conditions matches.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CondAndDes: Matches if all of the contained conditions matches.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CondNotDes: Matches if the contained condition does not match.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CondTextDe: Compares the specified value to a given text.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.ValueResea: Compare with research projects required by the recipe.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.ValueIngre: Compare with all ingredients, including every alternative.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CopyNoTip: Moves the menu option to the new place.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.CopyYesTip: Copies the menu option to the new place.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.OnCopiedNo: Do not apply on copies of menu options that were created by earlier rules.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.OnCopiedYe: Apply on copies of menu options that were created by earlier rules.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.OnMovedNoT: Do not apply on menu options that were moved by earlier rules.
LanguageData.kathanon.CategorizedBillMenus.OnMovedYes: Apply on menu options that were moved by earlier rules.
